src.middlewares package

Submodules

src.middlewares.database module

Handle requeriments for database connection and session for sqlalchemy. creates an engine. creates and export a db.session. creates and export a declarative base.

src.middlewares.responses module

Handle everything related to the request to the Statement endpoint. creates a dict for error messages. creates and export a class for Responses

class src.middlewares.responses.Response[source]

Bases: object

Class Response to handle response of the endpoints .. rubric:: Example

>>> Response.success(data={"id": 1, "name": "John Doe"})

static custom(content: Optional[Dict] = None, data: Optional[Dict] = None, status_code: int = 200, headers: Optional[Dict] = None) → JSONResponse[source]

Returns a response :param content: all the data to send. Defaults to None. :type content: dict, optional :param data: data inside of content to send. Defaults to None. :type data: dict, optional :param status_code: Status code. Defaults to 200. :type status_code: int, optional :param message: Message. Defaults to None. :type message: str, optional :param headers: Headers. Defaults to None. :type headers: dict, optional :param authorize: Authorization. Defaults to None. :type authorize: AuthJWT, optional

Returns

Response

Return type

Tuple[Dict, int]

static error(content: Optional[Dict] = None, data: Optional[Dict] = None, status_code: Optional[int] = 400, headers: Optional[Dict] = None) → JSONResponse[source]

Returns an error response :param content: all the data to send. Defaults to None. :type content: dict, optional :param data: data inside of content to send. Defaults to None. :type data: dict, optional :param status_code: Status code. Defaults to 400. :type status_code: int, optional :param headers: Headers. Defaults to None. :type headers: dict, optional
